feed.title: Josh Fiddler
feed.subtitle: This site will host the various project reports, tutorials, and research that I am working on. See the "About this Page" link

entry.title: Itâ€™s Alive!
entry.content:
Hey, Ma! Look at What I made!

This site, is my first foray into... uh well, a few things really. Let's see:
  1. GitHub Pages for a user or organisation
  2. Installing and configuring Jekyll for blogging and statis site building.
  3. Gitting it up with the two of the above to practice version control, branch maintenance for different purposes (master, feature-dev, drafts). I'm hoping that this structure will serve me well and let me practice some rebasing and other stuff.

This is also the first time that I've done anything worth pushing to the remote!

The next post will be an outline of the process that got me here so I can repeat it, if necessary, and make it automated in the future. I will simulpost on Medium as well.

Thanks for reading. Be good. Be kind. Peace. </div>
